item.title: AWS Elastic Beanstalk & Go
item.author: mark@markrichman.com (Mark Richman)
item.description: I’ll show you how to easily deploy a Go web application using AWS Elastic Beanstalk and Go. If you’re not familiar, AWS Elastic Beanstalk lets you deploy your app to AWS, and it takes care of load balancing and auto-scaling for you. No server configuration required at all. Itâ€™s cool because it supports lots of platforms - Java, PHP, .NET, Node.js, Python, Ruby, Docker, and Go. I like working with Go
